title: Supply Chain Domain Schema
description: Schema for the Supply Chain domain in the Orthogramic Metamodel

supplyChainID.description: Unique identifier for the supply chain element

title.description: The name or title of the supply chain element

description.description: A detailed explanation of the supply chain element

orgUnitTitle.description: The organization unit(s) responsible for this supply chain element

orgUnitRoles.description: Specific roles within the organization unit that manage this supply chain element

supplyChainScope.description: Organizational scope covered by this supply chain element

geographicCoverage.description: Geographic span of the supply chain element

endToEndLeadTime.description: Total time from order to delivery

environmentalImpact.description: Environmental effects of supply chain operations

strategicContribution.description: How supply chain contributes to strategy

alignmentDescription.description: How supply chain aligns with objective

competitiveAdvantage.description: How supply chain creates competitive advantage

dependencies.description: Other domains, processes, or systems supporting this supply chain element

domainType.description: Type of domain this depends on

entityID.description: ID of the entity being depended upon

relatedSupplyChainElements.description: Other supply chain elements with relationships to this one

elementID.description: ID of the related supply chain element

governanceModel.description: How the supply chain is governed

title: Supplier Network Schema
description: Schema for Supplier Network element in the Supply Chain domain

networkID.description: Unique identifier for the supplier network

description.description: Detailed explanation of the supplier network

orgUnitTitle.description: The organization unit responsible for this supplier network

supplyChainID.description: ID of the supply chain domain this network belongs to

supplierCategories.description: Types of suppliers in the network

visibilityLevel.description: Level of visibility into this tier

singleSourceComponents.description: Items with single source of supply

supplierCount.description: Number of suppliers with this relationship

governanceModel.description: How the supplier network is governed

riskLevel.description: Level of risk in this category

collaborationModel.description: How collaboration with suppliers is structured

intellectualPropertyApproach.description: How IP is managed in collaboration

title: Supply Chain Process Schema
description: Schema for Supply Chain Process element in the Supply Chain domain

processID.description: Unique identifier for the supply chain process

processTitle.description: Name of the supply chain process

description.description: Detailed explanation of the supply chain process

orgUnitTitle.description: The organization unit responsible for this process

supplyChainID.description: ID of the supply chain domain this process belongs to

processOwner.description: Individual or role responsible for the process

processSteps.description: Key activities involved in the process

processRisks.description: Specific risks related to this process

automationLevel.description: Level of automation for this step

title: Logistics Network Schema
description: Schema for Logistics Network element in the Supply Chain domain

networkID.description: Unique identifier for the logistics network

description.description: Detailed explanation of the logistics network

orgUnitTitle.description: The organization unit responsible for this logistics network

supplyChainID.description: ID of the supply chain domain this network belongs to

networkNodes.description: Key facilities and locations in the network

networkConnections.description: Connections between nodes in the network

transportationModes.description: Methods of transport used in the network

customerSegments.description: Customer segments using this service level

costImplications.description: Cost impact of this service level

costEfficiency.description: Cost performance of the logistics network

carbonFootprint.description: Environmental impact of the logistics network

networkFlexibility.description: Adaptability of the logistics network to change

thirdPartyLogistics.description: Third-party logistics providers in the network

networkOptimizationStrategy.description: Strategy for improving the logistics network

optimizationFocus.description: Key areas of focus for optimization

networkResilience.description: Ability of the network to withstand disruptions

title: Inventory Management Schema
description: Schema for Inventory Management element in the Supply Chain domain

inventoryID.description: Unique identifier for the inventory management element

description.description: Detailed explanation of the inventory management element

orgUnitTitle.description: The organization unit responsible for this inventory

supplyChainID.description: ID of the supply chain domain this inventory belongs to

demandPlanning.description: Approach to planning inventory based on demand
